Package gui

Class ServerConnectionsFrameController

java.lang.Object
gui.ServerConnectionsFrameController
public class ServerConnectionsFrameController extends Object
Controller class for managing the Server Connections UI. Displays a list of active client connections and provides the ability to shut down the server.

      Parameters:
      primaryStage - The primary stage for the application.

    • Shutdown

      public void Shutdown(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws Exception
      Handles the shutdown button action to stop the server and exit the application.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent triggered by the Shutdown button.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during the shutdown process.
